languages.text: {n}Что-то тупое, кровожадное и темное проступает на лице Наместника.{/n} "Если бы мы были просто двумя людьми — обычными людьми — пустотная крыса уже заставила бы вас проглотить эти слова вместе с собственными зубами". {n}На лицо Владайма возвращается обычное формальное выражение.{/n} "Но вы — славный Вольный Торговец, а я — Наместник Футфола, и подобные низкие забавы нам не по статусу. Так что — да, мой путь был долгим".

traits.locale_text: {n}Что-то тупое, кровожадное и темное проступает на лице наместника.{/n} "Если бы мы были просто двумя людьми — обычными людьми — пустотная крыса уже заставила бы вас проглотить эти слова вместе с собственными зубами". {n}На лицо Владайма возвращается обычное формальное выражение.{/n} "Но вы — славный Вольный торговец, а я — Наместник Футфола, и подобные низкие забавы нам не по статусу. Так что — да, мой путь был долгим".

languages.text: {n}Something dull, bloodthirsty, and dark surfaces on Vladaym's face.{/n} "If you and I were just people — ordinary people — this void rat would've already made you eat these words along with your own teeth." {n}Then his usual formal expression returns.{/n} "But you're an illustrious Rogue Trader, and I am the Liege of Footfall, and such lowbrow larks are beneath us. So — yes, my path was long."

Так что — да, мой путь был долгим".

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムの顔に、鈍く、血に飢えた、暗い何かが浮かぶ。{/n}「もし君と私が単なる…普通の人間だったなら…この空虚ネズミは、すでにその言葉を君の歯と共に食わせていただろう」{n}そう言うと、いつもの堅苦しい表情に戻る。{/n}「しかし、君はかの有名な自由開拓者で、私はフットフォールの領主。そのような低俗な戯れなど下の下の事。そう…ここまでの道のりは長かったのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Something dull, bloodthirsty, and dark surfaces on Vladaym's face.{/n} "If you and I were just people — ordinary people — this void rat would've already made you eat these words along with your own teeth." {n}Then his usual formal expression returns.{/n} "But you're an illustrious Rogue Trader, and I am the Liege of Footfall, and such lowbrow larks are beneath us. So — yes, my path was long."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムの顔に、鈍く、血に飢えた、暗い何かが浮かぶ。{/n}「もし君と私が単なる…普通の人間だったなら…この空虚ネズミは、すでにその言葉を君の歯と共に食わせていただろう」{n}そう言うと、いつもの堅苦しい表情に戻る。{/n}「しかし、君はかの有名な自由開拓者で、私はフットフォールの領主。そのような低俗な戯れなど下の下の事。そう…ここまでの道のりは長かったのだ」

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆的脸上浮现出阴沉、嗜血与邪恶的表情。{/n}“如果我们只是普通人的话，那这只过街老鼠恐怕会逼您把这些话咽回去，连同牙齿一起吞进肚子里。”{n}随后，他又变回了一贯严肃的神情。{/n}“但您是位杰出的行商浪人，而我是落脚港的总督，如此低级的嬉闹并不符合我们的身份。所以……您说得没错，我走了很久，才走到了今天这个地位。”
languages.original_text: {n}Something dull, bloodthirsty, and dark surfaces on Vladaym's face.{/n} "If you and I were just people — ordinary people — this void rat would've already made you eat these words along with your own teeth." {n}Then his usual formal expression returns.{/n} "But you're an illustrious Rogue Trader, and I am the Liege of Footfall, and such lowbrow larks are beneath us. So — yes, my path was long."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆的脸上浮现出阴沉、嗜血与邪恶的表情。{/n}“如果我们只是普通人的话，那这只过街老鼠恐怕会逼您把这些话咽回去，连同牙齿一起吞进肚子里。”{n}随后，他又变回了一贯严肃的神情。{/n}“但您是位杰出的行商浪人，而我是落脚港的总督，如此低级的嬉闹并不符合我们的身份。所以……您说得没错，我走了很久，才走到了今天这个地位。”

languages.text: {n}En el rostro de Vladaym aflora algo impasible, sanguinario y siniestro.{/n} «Si usted y yo fuéramos simples personas de a pie, esta rata del vacío ya le habría hecho tragarse sus palabras y sus propios dientes». {n}De repente, vuelve a su expresión formal de siempre.{/n} «Pero usted es {mf|un|una} ilustre Comerciante Independiente y yo, el Señor de Paso. Esas patrañas de baja estofa no están a nuestra altura. En fin... sí, he recorrido una larga trayectoria».
languages.original_text: {n}Something dull, bloodthirsty, and dark surfaces on Vladaym's face.{/n} "If you and I were just people — ordinary people — this void rat would've already made you eat these words along with your own teeth." {n}Then his usual formal expression returns.{/n} "But you're an illustrious Rogue Trader, and I am the Liege of Footfall, and such lowbrow larks are beneath us. So — yes, my path was long."

traits.locale_text: {n}En el rostro de Vladaym aflora algo impasible, sanguinario y siniestro.{/n} «Si usted y yo fuéramos simples personas de a pie, esta rata del vacío ya le habría hecho tragarse sus palabras y sus propios dientes». {n}De repente, vuelve a su expresión formal de siempre.{/n} «Pero usted es {mf|un|una} ilustre Comerciante Independiente y yo, el Señor de Paso. Esas patrañas de baja estofa no están a nuestra altura. En fin... sí, he recorrido una larga trayectoria».

languages.text: {n}Une expression maussade et sanguinaire assombrit le visage de Vladaym.{/n} « Si nous étions des gens ordinaires, vous et moi, cette "petite frappe" vous aurait déjà fait ravaler vos paroles et vos dents avec. » {n}Il reprend son air protocolaire et poursuit :{/n} « Mais vous êtes {mf|un|une} illustre {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} et je suis le suzerain de Castel ; ce genre de bisbille serait indigne de nous. Alors, oui... mon chemin a été tortueux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Something dull, bloodthirsty, and dark surfaces on Vladaym's face.{/n} "If you and I were just people — ordinary people — this void rat would've already made you eat these words along with your own teeth." {n}Then his usual formal expression returns.{/n} "But you're an illustrious Rogue Trader, and I am the Liege of Footfall, and such lowbrow larks are beneath us. So — yes, my path was long."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une expression maussade et sanguinaire assombrit le visage de Vladaym.{/n} « Si nous étions des gens ordinaires, vous et moi, cette "petite frape" vous aurait déjà fait ravaler vos paroles et vos dents avec. » {n}Il reprend son air protocolaire et poursuit :{/n} « Mais vous êtes {mf|un|une} illustre {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} et je suis le suzerain de Castel ; ce genre de bisbille serait indigne de nous. Alors, oui... mon chemin a été tortueux. »

languages.text: {n}In Vladayms Gesicht erscheint ein dumpfer, blutrünstiger und finsterer Zug.{/n} "Wären wir beide einfach Menschen – normale Menschen –, hätte die Leerenratte Euch diese Worte schon fressen lassen, zusammen mit Euren Zähnen." {n}Dann kehrt seine übliche unbeteiligte Miene wieder zurück.{/n} "Aber Ihr seid {mf|ein erlauchter Freihändler|eine erlauchte Freihändlerin}, und ich bin der Lehnsherr von Footfall, und deswegen sind derlei primitive Späße unter unsere Würde. Und daher – ja, mein Weg war lang."
languages.original_text: {n}Something dull, bloodthirsty, and dark surfaces on Vladaym's face.{/n} "If you and I were just people — ordinary people — this void rat would've already made you eat these words along with your own teeth." {n}Then his usual formal expression returns.{/n} "But you're an illustrious Rogue Trader, and I am the Liege of Footfall, and such lowbrow larks are beneath us. So — yes, my path was long."

traits.locale_text: {n}In Vladayms Gesicht erscheint ein dumpfer, blutrünstiger und finsterer Zug.{/n} "Wären wir beide einfach Menschen – normale Menschen –, hätte die Leerenratte Euch diese Worte schon fressen lassen, zusammen mit Euren Zähnen." {n}Dann kehrt seine übliche unbeteiligte Miene wieder zurück.{/n} "Aber Ihr seid {mf|ein erlauchter Freihändler|eine erlauchte Freihändlerin}, und ich bin der Lehnsherr von Footfall, und deswegen sind derlei primitive Späße unter unsere Würde. Und daher – ja, mein Weg war lang."

languages.text: {n}Vladaym'ın yüzünde donuk, kana susamış ve karanlık bir şey beliriyor.{/n} "İkimiz de sıradan, düz insanlar olsaydık bu uçsuz sıçanı, o lafı dişlerinizle beraber size yedirirdi." {n}Sonra her zamanki resmî ifadesini tekrar takınıyor.{/n} "Lakin siz şanlı bir Hür Tacir'siniz, ben ise Binliman Emîri. Bu tür avam davranışları bize yakışmaz. Demem o ki evet, uzun bir yol teptim."
languages.original_text: {n}Something dull, bloodthirsty, and dark surfaces on Vladaym's face.{/n} "If you and I were just people — ordinary people — this void rat would've already made you eat these words along with your own teeth." {n}Then his usual formal expression returns.{/n} "But you're an illustrious Rogue Trader, and I am the Liege of Footfall, and such lowbrow larks are beneath us. So — yes, my path was long."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym'ın yüzünde donuk, kana susamış ve karanlık bir şey beliriyor.{/n} "Sıradan, düz insanlar olsaydık o uçsuz sıçanı bu lafı dişlerinizle birlikte elinize verirdi." {n}Sonra her zamanki resmî ifadesini tekrar takınıyor.{/n} "Lakin siz ünlü bir Hür Tacir'siniz, ben ise Binliman Emîri. Bu tür avam davranışları bize yakışmaz. Demem o ki evet, uzun bir yol oldu."
